title: Decide the Shape of Parabola
text: Given any parabola in the form $${ax}^2+bx+c$$, a is called the leading coefficient of the parabola. If a is negative, the parabola opens downward. If a is positive, the parabola opens upward.

title: Decide the Shape of Parabola
text: Since a is positive, the parabola opens upward. So the quadratic equation has a minimum.

title: Find the Equation For Axis of Symmetry
text: Given $${ax}^2+bx+c$$, the axis of symmetry for the parabola is $$x=\frac{-b}{2a}$$.

title: Find the Equation For Axis of Symmetry
text: In the given parabola, $$a=2$$, $$b=1$$. The axis of symmetry is $$x=\frac{-1}{4}$$
